name: Hero Knight's Adventure (Fall 2021)
description:
This is a game I designed and coded entirely on my own. It's a 2D platforming game in which you find abilities which let you make progress.

Story: A hero discovers a mysterious castle. But the entrance closes behind him and locks him in!

  • WASD - Move
  • W - Jump
  • E - Hang from wall
  • S - Drop from Hanging
  • F - Enter
  • Space - Dash (Gained Ability)
  • Escape - Pause

I composed the main music of the game using Beepbox.co. There's an alternate theme that goes unused as of right now.

Status: There are a few things in this build that I noticed that bother me a little bit, so I may fix those and reupload. Other than that, I'm not sure how much more I'll work on this game.

Warning: There is no saving coded into the game yet (this is a feature I would like to add). However there is something at the end that you can use anywhere in the game. Get there to find out what.

Enjoy!
